translation: みんなで一つの場所に集まり話すデモ{#Name=" "}
source: みんなで一つの場所に集まり話すデモ{#Name=" "}

translation: So no one was in the shop, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So no one was in the shop, huh?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nope. Pretty stupid of 'em to leave it unguarded.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nope. Pretty stupid of 'em to leave it unguarded.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why don't you stand in until the shopkeeper comes back?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why don't you stand in until the shopkeeper comes back?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Why? I bet you'd be a good shopkeeper!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why? I bet you'd be a good shopkeeper!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Heh. I'm not sure I could keep myself from{LF}stealing everything.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. I'm not sure I could keep myself from{LF}stealing everything.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? Already? Can't we rest a little longer?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh? Already? Can't we rest a little longer?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Shut it. I'm leaving, and so are you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut it. I'm leaving, and so are you.{#Name="Zero"}
